text: Huizinge () is a village with a population of 100 in the municipality of Loppersum in the province of Groningen in the northeast of the Netherlands. On 16 August 2012, the heaviest induced earthquake in the Netherlands with a magnitude of 3.6 occurred with its epicenter in Huizinge. Geïnduceerde aardbevingen in Nederland, Royal Netherlands Meteorological Institute, 2013. title: Huizinge
